cme_analysis.summary: 1 Earth-directed CME, 11 on watch, 19 in transit.

forecast.rationale: Base p=30% from X4.2; Poorly connected (x0.4)

micro.summary: Past median recharge time for M-class. System ready for next event. P(flare 6h): 35%.

phase_info.description: Near black body. Impedance matched. Minimal stored energy.

thermalization.what_comes_next: Storage phase: hardness will continue rising. Watch for acceleration — rapid rise suggests approaching threshold.
thermalization.summary: System at EQUILIBRIUM. Hardness 0.0140 (near black body thermal). Minimal stored energy. Must charge before next significant activity.

recharge.summary: X-class: OVERDUE (269h since last) | M-class: OVERDUE (56h since last) | C-class: OVERDUE (138h since last)

meso.outlook: System at equilibrium. Flare risk: LOW. Significant activity requires charging phase first.

rotation.summary: AR4366 (X8.1 producer) returns to east limb in ~18 days (2026-03-05). History: 85 flares (6X, 78M, 1C), largest X8.1.

cycle.summary: σ_log trajectory: 0.847 (peak 2024) → 0.970 (now) → ~1.5 (est. 2031). Currently high_activity. Recovery rate: 0.058/year. Expected transition to next lower activity state in ~6 months. 2027 outlook: MODERATE — regular M-class, occasional X-class (σ_log ≈ 1.09, ~1.0 M/day).

extended_forecast.combined_outlook:
NEXT 6 HOURS (60% confidence):
  Past median recharge time for M-class. System ready for next event. P(flare 6h): 35%.

NEXT 1-3 DAYS (60% confidence):
  Thermalization phase: EQUILIBRIUM
  Storage phase: hardness will continue rising. Watch for acceleration — rapid rise suggests approaching threshold.
  Recharge: X-class: OVERDUE (269h since last) | M-class: OVERDUE (56h since last) | C-class: OVERDUE (138h since last)

ROTATION RETURN (35% confidence):
  AR4366: 85 flares (6X, 78M, 1C), largest X8.1 — returns ~2026-03-05 (in 18 days). Expected: HIGH — multiple X-class producer

CYCLE OUTLOOK (70% confidence):
  σ_log: 0.97 → ~1.5 (est. 2031)
  Trend: RISING_TO_MINIMUM
  2026: σ_log ≈ 1.00 — HIGH — frequent M-class, regular X-class (~2.5 M/day)
  2027: σ_log ≈ 1.09 — MODERATE — regular M-class, occasional X-class (~1.0 M/day)
  2028: σ_log ≈ 1.19 — LOW-MODERATE — occasional M-class (~1.0 M/day)
